mapper.insert: insert into LAB_INFO (ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_TYPE, LAB_REGIONALISM, LAB_NAME, LAB_ENGLISH_NAME, LAB_SHORT_NAME, LAB_ADDRESS, LAB_ZIP_CODE, LAB_PHONE, LAB_FAX_NO, EMAIL, LAB_LEVEL, LAB_SUBJECTION, PRINCIPAL_NAME, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, LAB_STATUS, AUDITOR, AUDIT_IDEA, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, DELETE_FLAG, COVERED_AREA, LEADERS_NAME, LEADERS_PHONE, LAB_DIRECTOR_NAME, LAB_DIRECTOR_PHONE, LAB_DBA_NAME, LAB_DBA_PHONE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initServerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labRegionalism,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labFaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labSubjection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditIdea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coveredArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leadersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leadersPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDirectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDirectorPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDbaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDbaPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update LAB_INFO set INIT_SERVER_NO = #{initServerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_TYPE = #{labType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_REGIONALISM = #{labRegionalism,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_NAME = #{labName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_ENGLISH_NAME = #{labEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_SHORT_NAME = #{labShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_ADDRESS = #{labAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_ZIP_CODE = #{labZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_PHONE = #{labPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_FAX_NO = #{labFaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_LEVEL = #{labLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_SUBJECTION = #{labSubjection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINCIPAL_NAME = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_STATUS = #{labStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_IDEA = #{auditIdea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COVERED_AREA = #{coveredArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADERS_NAME = #{leadersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADERS_PHONE = #{leadersPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_DIRECTOR_NAME = #{labDirectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_DIRECTOR_PHONE = #{labDirectorPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_DBA_NAME = #{labDbaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_DBA_PHONE = #{labDbaPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_TYPE, LAB_REGIONALISM, LAB_NAME, LAB_ENGLISH_NAME, LAB_SHORT_NAME, LAB_ADDRESS, LAB_ZIP_CODE, LAB_PHONE, LAB_FAX_NO, EMAIL, LAB_LEVEL, LAB_SUBJECTION, PRINCIPAL_NAME, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, LAB_STATUS, AUDITOR, AUDIT_IDEA, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, DELETE_FLAG, COVERED_AREA, LEADERS_NAME, LEADERS_PHONE, LAB_DIRECTOR_NAME, LAB_DIRECTOR_PHONE, LAB_DBA_NAME, LAB_DBA_PHONE from LAB_INFO where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_TYPE, LAB_REGIONALISM, LAB_NAME, LAB_ENGLISH_NAME, LAB_SHORT_NAME, LAB_ADDRESS, LAB_ZIP_CODE, LAB_PHONE, LAB_FAX_NO, EMAIL, LAB_LEVEL, LAB_SUBJECTION, PRINCIPAL_NAME, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, LAB_STATUS, AUDITOR, AUDIT_IDEA, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, DELETE_FLAG, COVERED_AREA, LEADERS_NAME, LEADERS_PHONE, LAB_DIRECTOR_NAME, LAB_DIRECTOR_PHONE, LAB_DBA_NAME, LAB_DBA_PHONE from LAB_INFO

select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_TYPE, LAB_REGIONALISM, LAB_NAME, LAB_ENGLISH_NAME, LAB_SHORT_NAME, LAB_ADDRESS, LAB_ZIP_CODE, LAB_PHONE, LAB_FAX_NO, EMAIL, LAB_LEVEL, LAB_SUBJECTION, PRINCIPAL_NAME, REMARK, DATA_SOURCE, LAB_STATUS, AUDITOR, AUDIT_IDEA, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, DELETE_FLAG, COVERED_AREA, LEADERS_NAME, LEADERS_PHONE, LAB_DIRECTOR_NAME, LAB_DIRECTOR_PHONE, LAB_DBA_NAME, LAB_DBA_PHONE from LAB_INFO WHERE 1=1
